Others: Zach LaVine scored 33 points in 33 minutes, marking his fifth consecutive game scoring at least 30 points, a career-high streak.
Nikola Vučević recorded a 23-point, 13-rebound double-double, surpassing Michael Jordan's record for double-doubles with the Bulls.
Lonzo Ball led the team with 1.5 steals per game and scored 12 points while making four 3-pointers.
Patrick Williams struggled offensively, scoring only two points on 1-for-8 shooting and missing all four of his 3-point attempts.
The Chicago Bulls improved to 8-11 at home with a 138-105 win over the Washington Wizards.
